document.full_text: the chamber of commerce has hired former attorney general michael mukasey to lobby congress to amend the foreign corrupt practices act, which bars american companies from bribing foreign officials, an official of the business advocacy group said.
document.title: former law chief to lobby on anti-bribery act
lines_and_colors: the chamber of commerce has hired former attorney general michael mukasey to lobby congress to amend the foreign corrupt practices act, which bars american companies from bribing foreign officials, an official of the business advocacy group said.
